Title: The Price
Plot: After becoming the hunted prey of the vicious Horde, Xena must lead the local army against them, while Gabrielle tends to the wounded and worries that Xena is returning to her dark and dangerous ways by stooping to the Horde's level.
GuestStars: Beth Allen, Paul Glover, Charles Mesure, Tamati Rice, Mark Perry, Justin Curry, Jason Hoyte
